ARDUINO CONNECTOR MODULE¶

class connector.ReadLine(s)¶

This class is used to create an object, that can optimize getting data from arduino board, cause it may take too long to parse it.

connector.connect()¶

This function is used to connect to serial port It uses serial_ports() to identify connected ports After connection is established it automatically starts receiving data and trying to connect to server

connector.connect_server()¶

This function is used to connect to our server After connection is established it automatically starts send data

connector.receive_send()¶

This function is used to send data from serial port to server or receive data from server and send it through serial port.

connector.serial_ports()¶

This function is used to search connected serial ports on user's device. Returns array of connected ports.
